entry.title: Bi-directional or uni-directional?
entry.summary: Alan is seeking clarification regarding the bi-directionality of channels in Lightning. While most tutorials describe them as bi-directional, he wonders if they are actually uni-directional based on his reading of a draft RFC. Alan is asking for confirmation on whether this is the case and, if so, the reason behind not implementing bi-directional channels in the first release.
